=== gtk-vnc-0.3.10 ===

* change @GTK_CFLAGS@ to @GTK_LIBS@ for gvncviewer_LDADD in examples/Makefile.am.

=== Patch ===
<pre>
--- tarballs/gtk-vnc-0.3.10/examples/Makefile.am	2009-08-28 10:31:55.000000000 -0600
+++ gtk-vnc-0.3.10/examples/Makefile.am	2010-07-21 13:03:52.000000000 -0600
@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@
 endif
 
 gvncviewer_SOURCES = gvncviewer.c
-gvncviewer_LDADD = ../src/libgtk-vnc-1.0.la @GTK_CFLAGS@ \
+gvncviewer_LDADD = ../src/libgtk-vnc-1.0.la @GTK_LIBS@ \
 		   @VIEW_LIBS@
 gvncviewer_CFLAGS = @GTK_CFLAGS@ @WARNING_CFLAGS@ \
 		    @VIEW_CFLAGS@ -I$(top_srcdir)/src/

</pre>
